entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
